products.name: Cole Haan Men's 5.Zerogrand Work Sneaker
products.description: COMFORTABLE FIT: These Cole Haan 5.Zerogrand shoes for men make your running sessions comfortable and energetic. They have a man-made insole designed while keeping your requirements in mind. The imported shoes have a stretchable collar made of ribbed knit, providing sufficient room to your feet for breathability. Their synthetic upper and outsole promise durability. LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN: The Cole Haan 5.Zerogrand men’s shoes are just the kind of footwear you are looking for. Run or walk with comfort by donning the lightweight Cole Haan 5.Zerogrand Work Sneaker. Their lightweight composition allows you to wear the shoes for long hours without feeling suffocated. They have a removable insole so that you can slip into them in any way you want. IDEAL FOR WORKOUTS: Designed to accompany you on those hardcore gym sessions, the summer shoes for men have a leather, textile, and synthetic composition. Their durable design with maximum traction ensures grip and support on every terrain. You can walk, jog, hike, or trek in these shoes without putting strain on your feet or leg muscles. RAISED HEIGHT: These Cole Haan running shoes have a round-toe silhouette with a raised height, giving you a better posture and confidence. Wear them to the gym or style them with your casual clothes and the shoes will seamlessly pair with anything you want to wear. The shoes have a pull tab at the rear end and a lace-up closure to easily wear them. COLOR & SIZE OPTIONS: The imported men’s fashion sneakers with a synthetic sole are available in a single color yet classic color – microchip with optic white and sleet. They have a medium width and are available in various size options – 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 10.5, 11, 11.5, 12, and 13. Pick the size that fits you accurately and head to the gym.

Standard fit. Responsible Wool Standard Certified: This global standard protects the sheep that supply the wool for this garment as well as the land they graze, working to make it better for the environment and the sheep. Fabric sourced from Italy's Zegna Baruffa mill. Johnny collar (no buttons). Straight hem. Standard fit. Long sleeves. Hip length. Model: Size M, 6'2" (188cm).

It's crafted from Italian cotton in a transitional weight with a subtle olive basketweave texture. In short, they're perfect for dressing up something as simple as a white tee to a crisp dress shirt wear them alone, or pair them with the matching jacket for a full suit. products.name: Heavy Slub Shirt
products.description: Introducing the Vince Heavy Slub Shirt, a versatile and timeless addition to your casual wardrobe. This shirt in blue features a spread collar, button cuffs, and a button front closure for a classic look. Made from 100% cotton, this shirt is comfortable and easy to care for with machine washable quality. Whether you're dressing up for a night out or keeping it casual, the Vince Heavy Slub Shirt is the perfect choice. Embrace the laid-back vibes of California with Vince's signature style that is effortlessly cool and always in fashion. Available in various sizes, this shirt is sure to become a staple in your closet.

We've partnered with Good On You — an independent agency that rates how brands perform in relation to their impact on the planet, people and animals, with a multi-criteria rating simplified to a five points scale. In order to be awarded our conscious label, larger brands need to score a minimum of four out of five ('Good'), while smaller brands must score at least three out of five ('It's A Start'). products.name: Italian Brushed Cotton Gurkha Trouser in Granite Grey
products.brandedName: Todd Snyder Italian Brushed Cotton Gurkha Trouser in Granite Grey
products.unbrandedName: Italian Brushed Cotton Gurkha Trouser in Granite Grey
products.description: Inspired by a vintage British military style, our modern update to the Gurkha Trouser is a bestseller. It's back for the season in a brushed Italian cotton. Design details include a double-pleated front and an adjustable, self-belted cummerbund-style waist that's meant to sit slightly higher than a typical pant would. The fit is relaxed through the upper section of the trouser and tailored through the leg. The beauty of the Gurkha is that its structure and shape instantly dress up any outfit, whether you're wearing it with a shirt jacket and loafers or a tee and sneakers. Tucked away in the heart of the Alps, the family-run Tessuti di Sondrio mill was founded in 1895 and is one of Italy's most revered cotton fabric weavers. 98% Cotton, 2% Elastane ; Melamine Buckles ; Adjustable Side Tabs ; Cummerbund Waist ; Double Forward Pleats ; Two Button-Through Back Pockets ; Clean Hem ; Unlined ; Fabric from Sondrio Mill in Italy ; Garment made in China ; Machine wash cold. Do not bleach. Hag to dry. Warm iron on iron reverse if necessary. Dry clean. Do not tumble dry; Style Number PA998837;
